info.name: Old Blue for tumblr if xkit isn't working
info.description:
Not perfect but does the job. You can use with the xkit add-on and it actually hides that quick flash of old background when the xkit script loads on a page refresh. 

Please check if you have the latest version.
info.additionalInfo:
The new post button colors are still there. 

I have no idea how to change the background color of the discard post screen so the new, darker blue is still visible there and few other spots.
